channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- libexif
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- libexif

item.title: CVE-2017-7544|2024-08-05T16:04:12.004Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- libexif
item.description: libexif through 0.6.21 is vulnerable to out-of-bounds heap read vulnerability in exif_data_save_data_entry function in libexif/exif-data.c caused by improper length computation of the allocated data of an ExifMnote entry which can cause denial-of-service or possibly information disclosure.
